body:
Hello everyone,


I have a noob question - What is the difference between rtrace and rsensor?
and which should be used when simulating real life illuminance sensors for
example for LEED IEQc 8.2 simulations.


I currently used rtrace and recieved results similar to the real life
sensor measurements, but with a result smaller by around 30%. Attached are
my comparisons - Results to the left (study case measurements) should be
multiplied by 10.


Thank you in advance.


https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B3RBjK2uI5SlaV92MTdLVHMzNUkxZWl6NGhWRHZDU19wY0xr/edit?usp=sharing


Bshara Rezik* |* B.Arch
